root.title: moni fund issu 125 mln dlr eurobond
root.body: moni fund inc issu 125 mln dlr eurobond due april 7 1997 pay 8-1/8 pct price 101-1/2 pct sole lead manag citicorp invest bank ltd say non-cal bond guarante mutual life insur co u. avail denomin 5,000 dlr list luxembourg sell concess 1-3/8 pct manag underwrit combin pay 5/8 pct payment date april 7
